parameters.name: X-API-Key
parameters.description: API key needed to authorize requests.

parameters.name: audioUrl
parameters.description: A url to the audio file to be synchronized -- must be publicly accessible

parameters.name: videoUrl
parameters.description: A url to the video file to be synchronized -- must be publicly accessible

post.description: Submit a set of urls to publically hosted audio and video files or to YouTube videos. Our synchronizer will sync the video's lip movements to match the audio and return the synced video.

parameters.name: X-API-Key
parameters.description: API key needed to authorize requests.

requestBody.description: The audio + video data to be synced. Set synergize = false to skip our synergizer post-processor for a 10x speedup, but w/ a degredation in output quality.

get.description: Use the video ID from the POST request to check video status. Keep checking until status is 'completed' and a download URL is provided.

parameters.name: X-API-Key
parameters.description: API key needed to authorize requests.

default.description: Returns video status and URL to download from.

info.title: Synchronize API
info.description: Synchronize API allows you to lipsync a video to any audio in any language.

audioUrl.description: A url to the audio file to be synchronized -- must be publicly accessible

videoUrl.description: A url to the video file to be synchronized -- must be publicly accessible

synergize.description: A flag to enable / disable post-processing

maxCredits.description: Maximum number of credits to use for video generation. If job exceeds this value, the job will be aborted

webhookUrl.description: A url to send a notification to upon completion of video generation

model.description: The model to use for video generation. Options are sync-1 and sync-1.5

id.description: A unique identifier for the video.

url.description: A URL which can be used to download the video.

original_video_url.description: The original URL of the video that was submitted.

original_audio_url.description: The original URL of the audio that was submitted.

synergize.description: A flag to enable / disable post-processing

credits_deducted.description: The number of credits deducted in order to process the video.
